scripts.start: echo '=> This is a terminal project and should not be published to npm! Exiting...' && exit 0
scripts.test: echo '=> Verifying...' && npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run test-unit-coverage
scripts.clean: echo '=> Cleaning built assets...' && rm -rf .nyc_output coverage
scripts.test-unit: echo '=> Running Tests...' && mocha -u tdd --timeout 60000 --colors test/unit/**/*.spec.js
scripts.watch-test-unit: echo '=> Running Test Watcher...' && mocha --watch test/unit/**/*.spec.js
scripts.test-unit-coverage: echo '=> Running Tests w/ Coverage...' && nyc npm run test-unit && nyc --reporter=html report && nyc --lines 80 --functions 80 --branches 80 --per-file check-coverage
